about.text: My name is Xavier Catchot and I am a Barcelonese <mark>front-end developer</mark> and <mark>SEO consultant</mark> currently based in Turku, Finland. With 20+ years of experience of building websites, I have vast experience in <mark>e-Commerce</mark> and <mark>search engine optimization</mark>.
